de: Harmonizer of the living spaces, Philippe Poulard, professional of the Arts and Crafts, creates in the respect of the materials all your metallic desires. These realizations link the useful and the beautiful, integrate, make themselves accessible and pleasant to all...
ru: Harmonizer of the living spaces, Philippe Poulard, professional of the Arts and Crafts, creates in the respect of the materials all your metallic desires. These realizations link the useful and the beautiful, integrate, make themselves accessible and pleasant to all...
en: Harmonizer of the living spaces, Philippe Poulard, professional of the Arts and Crafts, creates in the respect of the materials all your metallic desires. These realizations link the useful and the beautiful, integrate, make themselves accessible and pleasant to all...
it: Harmonizer of the living spaces, Philippe Poulard, professional of the Arts and Crafts, creates in the respect of the materials all your metallic desires. These realizations link the useful and the beautiful, integrate, make themselves accessible and pleasant to all...
fr: Harmonisateur des lieux de vie, Philippe Poulard, professionnel des Métiers d'Art, crée dans le respect des matières tous vos désirs métalliques. Ces réalisations lient l'utile et le beau, s'intègrent, se rendent accessibles et agréables à tous...
zh: Harmonizer of the living spaces, Philippe Poulard, professional of the Arts and Crafts, creates in the respect of the materials all your metallic desires. These realizations link the useful and the beautiful, integrate, make themselves accessible and pleasant to all...
es: Harmonizer of the living spaces, Philippe Poulard, professional of the Arts and Crafts, creates in the respect of the materials all your metallic desires. These realizations link the useful and the beautiful, integrate, make themselves accessible and pleasant to all...
nl: Harmonisator van de leefruimtes, Philippe Poulard, professional van de Arts and Crafts, creëert in het respect voor de materialen al uw metaalwensen. Deze realisaties verbinden het nuttige en het mooie, integreren, maken zichzelf toegankelijk en aangenaam voor iedereen...

en: Le Fer Savoir - Ironwork of art
